column2: BRIEF-Graphic Packaging Holding Co Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.10 April 24 (Reuters) - Graphic Packaging Holding Co: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.17 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q1 2018 NET INCOME WAS NEGATIVELY IMPACTED BY A NET $28.2 MILLION OF SPECIAL CHARGES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
